comment: This is Nelly Jerez, Honduras sub-secretary of international relations. She is in charge of and oversees migrant issues in Honduras. Why does she have an Israeli flag in her office? Why does it have the same prominence as the Honduran flag?
amr:
# ::snt This is Nelly Jerez, Honduras sub-secretary of international relations. She is in charge of and oversees migrant issues in Honduras. Why does she have an Israeli flag in her office? Why does it have the same prominence as the Honduran flag?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Nelly"
                  :op2 "Jerez")
            :domain (t / this)
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (c / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Honduras"))
                  :ARG2 (s / subsecretary
                        :topic (r / relation-03
                              :ARG1 (ii / international)))))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (c2 / charge-05
                  :ARG1 (s2 / she)
                  :ARG2 (ii2 / issue-02
                        :ARG0 (m2 / migrate-01)
                        :location c))
            :op2 (o / oversee-01
                  :ARG0 s2
                  :ARG1 ii2))
      :snt3 (c3 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 s2)
            :ARG1 (f / flag
                  :mod (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Israel")))
            :location (o2 / office
                  :poss s2))
      :snt4 (c5 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a3 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (h3 / have-03
                  :ARG0 s2
                  :ARG1 (p2 / prominence
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01
                              :ARG2 (f2 / flag
                                    :mod (c6 / country
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Honduras"))))))))
